documents.document: @CeliaFleck yes! That opening paragraph was straight off the record player. Thanks 4 sharing practical activities. Im going to give em a go!
@stephcamp1 @Welly_ED I just approved the form so assuming @AKeenReader will have them out for the weekend 😀
@bedegilmore and you. Must be great knowing you can start the year with a vision you are part of.
@Periwinkle007 @LittleGold fun! I have 2 year 7's starting with you this year. They'll love that!
@bedegilmore documenting learning and sharing with each other and families
@bedegilmore I used it last year but decided to use blogs this year. It all depends on the purpose you have...
@AHM_irl I hope it was carthatic... and I hope you got given a glass of water ☺️
@LittleGold maybe go with preempting context? Activate prior knowledge? Provocation? Could then move towards recording your lessons/rewind
@LittleGold how bizarre! I'm so pleased you found him though!
@LittleGold ours went out early when we moved and we found him 3 months later just down the road. Cats are very resilient!
@LittleGold I have great hope he'll return. Perhaps when it stops raining. Keep shaking those cat biscuits!
@LittleGold is he under the house?
